title: Reuters reveals India rice export curbs to end a decade of price stability
dc:creator: Ramisa Tasnim
description:
Reuters shed light on how India’s recent curbs on rice exports could trigger a rally in global prices after more […]

The post Reuters reveals India rice export curbs to end a decade of price stability appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
content:encoded:
Reuters shed light on how India’s recent curbs on rice exports could trigger a rally in global prices after more than a decade of stability, as New Delhi’s protectionist move coincides with falling output in other major producers and rising global demand.

The post Reuters reveals India rice export curbs to end a decade of price stability appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
